Class SoundPlayer

java.lang.Object
  engine.SoundPlayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventListener, LineListener
public class SoundPlayer
extends Object
implements LineListener

A class which allows the playing of four different sound effects.

Author:
wjs25

playSound

public void playSound(String sound)
Plays the sound specified.

Parameters:
sound - Supported sounds: "die", "finish", "food_collection", "food deposition".

Check whether the sounds are muted.

Returns:

update

public void update(LineEvent le)
This is called automatically when the state of the clip changes. In this case we only check for when a clip stops, so we can reset the read position for the clip to the beginning of the file.

Specified by:
update in interface LineListener
